long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Eclipse hat is designed help you keep a cool head on hot summer days. Lightweight polyester fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from the sun's solar rays; water-resistant fabric helps shed moisture. Flip-up panels on the sides of the hat expose mesh vents to help keep your head cool. Interior wicking sweatband moves moisture off your brow. 3 in.-long brim folds in half so you can easily stuff the hat in a pocket. The Sunday Afternoons Eclipse hat has a low-profile rip-and-stick strap in back that adjusts the fit.
short_description: The Sunday Afternoons Eclipse hat is designed help you keep a cool head on hot summer days.
